recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti, ground beef, tomato sauce, onions, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper
recipes.process: Boil spaghetti. Cook ground beef with onions and garlic. Add tomato sauce and simmer. Mix with spaghetti and serve hot.

recipes.name: Classic Pancakes
recipes.ingredients: Flour, eggs, milk, baking powder, sugar, butter, salt
recipes.process: Mix all ingredients into a smooth batter. Pour on a hot griddle and cook until golden on both sides. Serve with syrup.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, spices, oil, salt
recipes.process: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. Add spices and chicken. Cook until browned. Add tomatoes and simmer until chicken is tender.

recipes.name: Fresh Vegetable Salad
recipes.ingredients: Lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, carrots, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper
recipes.process: Chop all vegetables. Mix in a bowl. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Vegetable Fried Rice
recipes.ingredients: Cooked rice, carrots, peas, bell peppers, soy sauce, garlic, oil
recipes.process: Heat oil, sauté garlic and vegetables. Add rice and soy sauce. Stir-fry for a few minutes and serve hot.

recipes.name: Chocolate Cake
recipes.ingredients: Flour, cocoa powder, eggs, sugar, butter, baking powder, milk
recipes.process: Mix dry and wet ingredients separately. Combine and pour into a greased pan. Bake at 180°C for 35-40 minutes.
